items-per-page.description: The number of entries per page. When the result feed is paged, the attribute items-per-page will be displayed in the feed.

page.description: The number of the page to be served. When the result feed is paged, the attribute page will be displayed in the feed.

links.description: Ensures whether link relations to be returned for this object representation. * 'true', return links for the object. * 'false' do not return links for the object.

category.description: The category in Synonyms built-in dictionary of CCE(Contextual Content Engine) to search for word.

word.description: The word that needs to be passed to CCE(Contextual Content Engine) to check.
